title: Hey Ruqqus Developers... Can we get a crosspost feature and and a way for guildmasters to remove spam posts without exiling the poster? Thanks

ctrl alt delete

Guildmaster of +Weezer +DeepIntoYouTube +ObscureMedia +SoftwareGore +Race and +NASCAR

Somewhat of a troll, don't take everything I say seriously.

body: I would prefer if there is cross posting to not give the crossposter the rep, that feature would lead to repwhoring like it leads to karmawhoring on r*ddit.
body_html: I would prefer if there is cross posting to not give the crossposter the rep, that feature would lead to repwhoring like it leads to karmawhoring on r*ddit.

post.title: Hey Ruqqus Developers... Can we get a crosspost feature and and a way for guildmasters to remove spam posts without exiling the poster? Thanks

body: A cross posting feature would make posting easier as the content I post is often related to 2 or more guilds. I feel "guilty" in a sense to have to repost the same content in multiple guilds and essentially get rep from the same people for each post.
body_html: A cross posting feature would make posting easier as the content I post is often related to 2 or more guilds. I feel "guilty" in a sense to have to repost the same content in multiple guilds and essentially get rep from the same people for each post.

body: You can crosspost actually! Just put the original post as the URL and it'll show up as a crosspost.
body_html: You can crosspost actually! Just put the original post as the URL and it'll show up as a crosspost.
